short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sanders EntraID Tenant Restriction that brings tenant restrictions v2 to the browser via extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides support for Microsoft EntraID Tenant Restrictions V2. This extension injects the header for the Microsoft sign-on URLs. after that the access to other m365 tenants can be controlled via Microsoft EntraID.
